Author: truereply
Title: [ANN]True Reply True Coin: the Future is Voice join now and earns daily interest
Body: It's not so much that they have proven themselves less effective it's more about how effective is text-based data-collection (i.e. online forms) going to be in a world driven by voice? When our interactions with our computer systems are all voice-driven, we need a platform that can interface with that, collect data, and make that data easily accessible and understandable. That platform is True Reply  - jose, CEO of True Reply

Author: truereply
Title: [ANN]True Reply True Coin: the Future is Voice join now and earns daily interest
Body: Hi guys, sorry not to get in here sooner to help answer some of the questions.  First - it's important to understand that the platform IS BUILT. we're launched and anyone can sign up via truereply.com or try us out via an Amazon Alexa (currently limited to the U.S). We're in a building-out and marketing stage - not in a building stage. we're past prototype and MVP.  Second - let's talk about the tech.  It’s now possible to turn on lights with our voice, you can order a ride with Uber, order Toothpaste through Amazon, ask Google a question, and play your favorite podcast with just your voice. And all this is possible because of very rudimentary - what I call stage 1 - advancements in technologies like  AI and machine learning. Rudimentary by comparison to what will be possible in just a couple of years when we hit stage 2 and stage 3.  To us, stage 2 will be getting Siri or Alexa to understand 99% of the time (v.s. what your experience might be like now which is more like 65-75%). Stage 3 will be conversational and much more AI driven; Imagine something like HAL in your kitchen (terrifying right, but that’s where we are going). Were we are headed is pretty clear, every single computing device you use today is moving towards a dedicated voice-based interface.  We are just at the beginning of what is possible with voice and voice-based technologies. What True Reply is building is not so much the tech to help understand your words better; beyond what we have already built and launched, we're building the Empathy Algorithm. This will help OEMs (original equipment manufacturers) and software developers in voice-based interfaces understand WHY you're saying the words your saying.  For more details - we're amazing transparent and available across all your favorite social channels and telegram.  Here are some worthy links to start with to learn more details:  Website https://truereply.com/uto?rid=bitcointalk (buy using this link and receive a 10% bonus Airdrop at the end of our sale!) White paper https://www.dropbox.com/s/opcghqn37codqbr/white%20paper.pdf?dl=0 Telegram https://t.me/truereply Twitter https://twitter.com/truereply Facebook https://facebook.com/truereply Instagram https://instagram.com/truereply YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeiFwXEYtJgkhGSXlHgDxWQ?view_as=subscriber  In media: CCN.com https://www.ccn.com/true-reply-intelligent-survey-platform-integrate-voice-technology-blockchain-revolutionizing-market-research-boosting-cryptocurrency/ PopularICO.com https://www.popularico.com/2018/02/03/truereply-uto-backed-by-the-only-amazon-approved-incentivized-survey-platform/ FoundIco.com https://foundico.com/ico/true-reply.html  Our videos: https://youtu.be/3-XA98D9c6M https://youtu.be/FdGLoc5RTLc More on our YouTube Channel from above.  Reviews: YouTube (English) https://youtu.be/uH7itw9qrIU YouTube (Hindi) https://youtu.be/7APHTR6V-hY YouTube (Polish) https://youtu.be/UapUBDI_Peo

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN]True Reply True Coin: the Future is Voice join now and earns daily interest

Author: truereply
Title: [ANN]True Reply True Coin: the Future is Voice join now and earns daily interest
Body: Our main goal is to impact the world and create a platform of understanding.  Today, we help companies and organizations understand their communities and audience better through the use of automated, voice-based surveys via telephone and/or Amazon Alexa-powered devices. That understanding comes from making the audio-recorded responses to the surveys completely accessible, searchable, and actionable.  This first step by us impacts the community at large because every survey deployed via Amazon Alexa is done so as an incentivized survey. So if you participate and take a survey via your amazon alexa, you earn money. That money you earn can be cashed out to PayPal OR crypto via TrueCoin. Check out the TrueCoin Economy article we published https://medium.com/@truereply/understanding-the-truecoin-economy-2c8209f2f9a8  Tomorrow, we want to help all companies build a better understanding into their AI, robotics, and home automation systems. Our vision, the Empathy Algorithm, is to allow siri, alexa, and your tesla to understand WHY you say things not just WHAT you're saying or asking for. It's an important difference that is required if you ever want to reach the stage where robots are helping us throughout your home or robots in business.  I know this sounds far fetched, but its not. It's not if but when. And when robots hit our homes at scale, the Empathy Algorithm will fill the simple piece of letting the robots understand your emotion and state of mind.  In short, our audience - the users of True Reply and the True Reply platform - is pretty far reaching; both with what we have today and definitely with what we are building for the world of tomorrow.
